content: note this pattern is available for free on my blog crème brûlée cable knit hat is knitted in round on circular needles if you are looking how to knit the same hat in row please follow this link https //crazyhands net/creme-brulee-cable-knit-hat-pattern-straight-needles/ **video tutorial ** https //www youtube com/watch v=ji5cgr7bjga you are welcome to follow my **youtube** channel https //www youtube com/channel/ucwqwxlyqk9vjedzoiqjw-wa **facebook** https //www facebook com/groups/crazyhands net/ **instagram ** https //www instagram com/amurushka_amur/
